name: GoblinClimber
description:
You must climb the tower without sinking into the lava

The tower is endless and the obstacles will increase the higher you go

This is a submission for the ScoreSpace Jam#9

With 72 Hours development time the goal was to design with two themes :

Highscore and Climbing.

Devs :

blueplate.itch.io

bakob.itch.io

monogenesis.itch.io

Art :

@sandordude

Music :

soundimage.org

If you have performance issues with the WebGL version consider trying the Windows Standalone.
